content: Amen to all of that. Bernie is the best thing to come along the pike since … well I don’t even know who to point at. I am thankful for his campaign and that it opened my eyes to the truth. we have a lot of work to do in this country. The neocons are falling all over themselves to keep the illusion going but the smoke and mirrors … they can’t keep up the charade forever. We’ve seen too much behind the curtain shenanigans …
